body_html: @vchigrin Ah, I'll also hunt for ways to make the docs formatted a bit better. As for the gradient operations, it seems like you refactored some of the common components for the op and essentially did identical operations for both the op and the grad. If this summary is correct, then I greatly appreciate this addition. This was next on my todo list, but I hadn't found the time. Thanks a lot!

body: @vchigrin Ah, I'll also hunt for ways to make the docs formatted a bit better. As for the gradient operations, it seems like you refactored some of the common components for the op and essentially did identical operations for both the op and the grad. If this summary is correct, then I greatly appreciate this addition. This was next on my todo list, but I hadn't found the time. Thanks a lot!
